name: Hohwan
description:
호ː환, 虎患 [ho:hwan]

 noun

 human or livestock attacked by tiger.


you are crossing the mountains at night to reach the village. There are tigers will attack you in the mountains, but Moon will guide you through mountains.

Game made for Themed Horror Game Jam #7
